jobDescription: Synack is redefining how organizations do security. We are passionate about making the world more secure and our mission is to proactively help organizations defend against cyber attacks before they get breached. How do we do it? By building a team that isn't afraid to think outside the box or take on big challenges. Imagine the possibilities at Synack - a company that CNBC named to their elite Top Disruptor list in 2015, again in 2016, and yet again in 2017. #threepeat.
